title: Building a REST API with Django & Django REST Framework
summary:
REST APIs are capable of providing valuable services within and beyond
an organization. Django and the Django REST Framework enabled my team to
quickly deliverable a highly functional REST API that was customized to
our unique needs. This discussion will cover how easy Django makes it to
build such an application and how to overcome potential pitfalls.
